title: Watch: Joe Biden makes it weird creepin' on a young lady at a coffee shop as he's asked about embattled cabinet member
description:
On Friday, President Joe Biden visited an Allentown coffee shop in an attempt to make him look like a man of the people with a little retail politics. Aides were quickly reminded for the eleventy-fifth time why they should not do such things. For some reason, no one working for Team Biden has grasped the concept of how pictures are worth a thousand words and videos are worth more.

This is not a man who should be allowed to decide when he doesn't want to take a nap, let alone be allowed to decide on a nuclear strike. As a side note, while I'm sure you've heard Allentown is Biden's hometown, what you might not know is that Pennsylvania Democrats have been transitioning into Pennsylvania Republicans in YUGE numbers.

title: Florida Bill Would Make “Lewd Or Lascivious Grooming” Of Minors A Felony, First Offenders Get Hit With HARSH Penalty
description:
Florida has introduced a bill that would make "lewd or lascivious grooming” a second-degree felony. However, it is unclear why it took this long for someone to introduce such a sane bill.

— (@)

According to the National Review:

“A new bill in Florida would make “lewd or lascivious grooming” a second-degree felony, punishable by up to 15 years in prison and $10,000 in fines for first offenders.

title: Watch: Trump Trolls Biden With Hilarious "White House Senior Living" Ad
description:
Does life imitate art? Or does art imitate life? Who cares. Now enjoy this hilarious ad of Trump trolling Biden that seems so real, it is unclear whether or not it is a parody.


Trump trolls Biden with 'White House senior living' ad: 'Where residents feel like presidents' www.youtube.com

That was just too accurate to be considered satire. The Trump Campaign nailed it with this ad, all the way down to the chocolate chip ice cream and the where “residents feel like presidents" phrase.
